name: UITextDropRequest
desc: The interface for specifying the attributes of a drop request for a text view.

items.name: var dropPosition: UITextPosition
items.desc: The text position corresponding to the location of a drop session.

items.name: var isSameView: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the drag and the drop are within the same text view.

items.name: var suggestedProposal: UITextDropProposal
items.desc: The text drop proposal offered by the text view.

items.name: var dropSession: UIDropSession
items.desc: The drop session for the text view.
